name: Monthly Revenue Report
query:
SELECT 
    DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%%Y-%%m') AS "Month:Data:150",
    SUM(amount) AS "Total Revenue:Currency:150"
FROM 
    `tabGym Membership`
WHERE
    status IN ('Active', 'Expired')
GROUP BY 
    DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%%Y-%%m')
ORDER BY 
    DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%%Y-%%m') ASC;
